items.sentence: Do you think that you should be doing that without permission?
Tom promised himself that he'd study harder for the next test.
We had a lot of chances to do that while we were in Australia.
If you continue doing that that way, you'll likely get killed.
On a good day, you can see the coast of Estonia from Helsinki.
I'm sorry. I didn't hear you. I was focused on something else.
No matter what the price of gas is, I need to fill up my tank.
Tom stared at Mary as if she were speaking a foreign language.
My father played the trumpet, and my mother played the violin.
There are no words to describe the terror I felt at that time.
